text:
前天给Clawdbot下令：“这个甲方太难伺候了，帮我搞定他，让他痛快签合同。”

当天晚上，它分析了甲方王总的所有社交动态，得出结论：王总的软肋是“怕老婆”和“迷信”。

“Meet Moltbot (formerly Clawdbot) — a local-first AI assistant for builders.
Trailer drop ”

#AI #OpenSource #Developers #LocalAI #Automation #IndieHackers
Spent 4 hours last night setting up clawdbot and it was so much hassle I don’t even wanna touch it again

Why everyone is running to buy mac mini for Clawdbot !! I get it how powerfull it is but I m poor For a ram stick, and new tech/AI stuff coming daily making hard for me to follow. I was happy with 2-3 Ai chatbots few years back, now this much!! GPU burn is real
#aitrend #Clawdbot
clawdbot armame una granja de enderpearls
